text_block_list.text: And so the Selection Race approached. It seemed like Smart Falcon was participating in a 1600m race on turf, but……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hauuu～…… wait, no good, no good. An Umadol should always smile and be cute and cheerful!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But you know. If it happens this time too…… no! I've been doing my best during training, so I'm fine, I'm fine.
It seemed like she was unable to clear her unease as the race started.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaa!!
Smart Falcon pressed forward with great strength. However, the trainers around me showed no reaction.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text: Smart Falcon, huh…… every time, things just don't seem to click. Even though I know she's doing her best……
Just like that trainer said, she didn't seem to do well at all……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haaaa…… Haaaa…… Haaa…… Hauu～n……
Out of 12 participants, Smart Falcon finished 10th.
Her results left something to be desired but, there seemed to be something about her strength and form. I didn't think she was an ordinary Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are! Oh geez～, I showed you something shameful. Falco's reflecting on that.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But, but, Idols and Uma Musume, you could say seeing their growth is respectable, and makes you want to cheer them on…… isn't that right? Right!
Maybe it wasn't a matter of growth, but a matter of compatibility. With the way she ran, I couldn't help but think she was suited for dirt……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……as I thought, is that a no?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……you see, my last Selection Race was as bad as this one. Since I haven't been able to get results this whole time, nobody has even talked to me……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I know that I'm lacking in abilities. But, but you see…… I definitely want to become a top Umadol!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Winning races and standing as the center in the biggest Live. But, to stand on that stage, as frustrating as it is, I can't do it solo……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That's right, I need Trainer-san's…… I need your support!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's fine even if you just tell me how I should train! Please, lend me your strength!!
In her every word, I could sense her determination for her dream. Since I was a trainer, I couldn't help but want to respond to that determination.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehh, really!? Is it really okay!? Howaa, I guess it doesn't hurt to ask, huh～……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alllright, I look forward to working with you! Don't hold back with the training, okay? Trainer-san!
And so, setting aside whether I would become her trainer for now, the days of training in preparation for the next Selection Race began.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huunnn…… nunununununu～～～～nnn☆☆

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Wow, that girl's crazy. She's doing leg curls with so much weight. ……smiling while doing it is kinda scary though.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alllright! Falco's running up☆ Soryaryaryarya～n!
……there were no problems with her slope running and strength training. Or rather, her power was way above average. However――

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa…… H-how's my time!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haa～n…… depressing. I haven't improved at allll～……
As expected, when I let her run on the turf, her results aren't that great. It seemed like this was definitely a question of aptitude.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaa, Suzuka-saaan!! Look over here～!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um…… excuse me, I want to practice so I can get ready for tomorrow's race……
Silence Suzuka had a troubled look on her face in front of the sudden cheers. She had already debuted and as an Uma Musume, had already gotten great results.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Now now～ You shouldn't intrude on her private life. That's the basics of being a fan, right!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: You see, Suzuka-chan is in the middle of recharging her sparkliness so she can shine on stage! As a fan you should look forward to that! Don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: That's true…… Sorry for bothering you～!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Falcon-senpai, thank you. I wasn't sure what I should have done……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Stop it with the Falco-senpai☆ At times like these, you should just properly ask them and they'll understand♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But, you probably know that better than I do……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……Anyways, you're going to be practicing, right? Falco will be cheering for you☆ Go ahead and get started♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ――So, I wonder why you're putting Falco on dirt!?
choice_data_list: I wanted to measure your time on dirt

text_block_list.text: She was in a place that required power― in other words, dirt. I wanted to see if she was suited for it.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……Uuu～…… I understand! But…… but, don't get your hopes up too high, okay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Uryaryaryaryaryarya～!!
As I expected…… no, it was more than I expected. Her speed while on the dirt was incomparable to when she was on turf―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……
Now I was certain. Rather than on turf, she could display her true strength on dirt, where power was necessary.
But that made me wonder. If it was like this, her instructor should have already noticed this……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uuu…… I knew you'd say that.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But…… but dirt is a no!! I don't want to～～!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's no good if Falco doesn't win on turf. There's no point if I don't……! That's why―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……I have dance lessons, so I'm done for today! Thanks for the hard work～～～!!
I watched as she went dashing off with amazing speed on the dirt. The reason she was so set on turf…… it seemed like there would be some hint there to help her grow.
